name: Eden's Bloom Floral Ceramic Tea Set of 3 pcs
description:
A lovely blend of creative craftsmanship and the ethereal beauty of botanical flowers is our enchanting Eden's Bloom Teaset.Whether you're hosting a gathering or enjoying a quiet moment alone, this teaset adds a touch of sophistication and a dash of natural wonder to any setting. The delicate hues and exquisite designs inspire the peace of a flowering garden, adding a sensory dimension to your morning cup of tea. With each pour, lose yourself in the poetry of nature , savouring the beauty and elegance that never fades.

Set of 3
5.5" Tea pot- 1
4" Milk pot- 1
4" Sugar pot- 1

description: Taking inspiration from the luscious feature of the blue macaw, we tried to indulge its vivacious and elegant feel and inculcate it with the Arabic theme in this collection. name: Green Leaf Bowls
description:
Elevate your dining experience with our exquisite Green Leaf Ceramic Bowl, a perfect blend of artistry and functionality. Crafted with meticulous attention to detail, this bowl features a vibrant green glaze that brings a touch of nature to your table. The intricate leaf pattern is hand-carved, giving each piece a unique, organic feel.

Material: High-quality ceramic, ensuring durability and a smooth, glossy finish.
Design: Inspired by nature, the bowl's leaf motif is both elegant and versatile, making it ideal for both casual and formal settings.

name: Paris Exclusive Ceramic Dinner Set of 8 Pcs
description:
Paris is a beautiful symphony of art and nature. This collection holds the roots of magnificent mandala art blended glamorously with olive green tones making this collection chic and classy. Beautifully handcrafted by our skilled craftsmen in India, the pattern design is usually created with nature-based elements, curved lines, and spirals.

These monochromatic pieces go perfectly with their complete set or can even mix and match.

This set comes with 

Set of 2- 2x Dinner Plates, 2x Quater Plates, 2x Soup Bowl, 2x Portion Bowl.

Set For 2 people
Package weight 4.5kg
Ceramic Stoneware
Glossy finish
Eco-friendly and Sustainable
Microwave and dishwasher safe
Dimensions

Dinner Plates- 10”x10”x1.5”
Quarter Plates- 7”x7”x1”
Soup Bowl- 4.5”x4.5”x2.75”
Portion Bowl- 3.5”x3.5”x2.5"
Note- Each piece is handcrafted by our artisans which makes it unique and may show some difference in color, shape, and finish.
